MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride, affecting properties in Hunters Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.01pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the unplanned electricity fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.08PM on Thursday 25 February 2021.
